verses.verse: In that day<WH3117> there shall be a fountain<WH4726> opened<WH6605> to the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732> and to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, for sin<WH2403> and for uncleanness<WH5079>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, that I will cut off<WH3772> the names<WH8034> of the idols<WH6091> out of the land<WH776>, and they shall no more be remembered<WH2142>; and also I will cause the prophets<WH5030> and the unclean<WH2932> spirit<WH7307> to pass<WH5674> out of the land<WH776>.

And it shall come to pass that<WH376>, when any shall yet prophesy<WH5012>, then his father<WH1> and his mother<WH517> that begat<WH3205> him shall say<WH559> unto him<WH2421>, Thou shalt not live; for thou speakest<WH1696> lies<WH8267> in the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>; and his father<WH1> and his mother<WH517> that begat<WH3205> him shall thrust<WH1856> him through when he prophesieth<WH5012>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that the prophets<WH5030> shall be ashamed<WH954> every one<WH376> of his vision<WH2384>, when he prophesieth<WH5012>; neither shall they wear<WH3847> a hairy<WH8181> mantle<WH155> to deceive<WH3584>:
but he shall say<WH559>, I am no prophet<WH5030>, I am a tiller<WH5647> of the ground<WH120>; for I have been made a bondman<WH7069> from my youth<WH5271>.

And one shall say<WH559> unto him<WH4347>, What are these wounds between thine arms<WH3027>? Then he shall answer<WH559>, Those with which I was wounded<WH5221> in the house<WH1004> of my friends<WH157>.

Awake <WH5782>, O sword<WH2719>, against my shepherd<WH7462>, and against the man<WH1397> that is my fellow<WH5997>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>: smite<WH5221> the shepherd<WH7462>, and the sheep<WH6629> shall be scattered<WH6327>; and I will turn<WH7725> my hand<WH3027> upon the little ones<WH6819>.

And it shall come to pass<WH776>, that in all the land, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, two<WH8147> parts<WH6310> therein shall be cut off<WH3772> and die<WH1478>; but the third<WH7992> shall be left therein<WH3498>.

And I will bring<WH935> the third part<WH7992> into the fire<WH784>, and will refine<WH6884> them as silver<WH3701> is refined<WH6884>, and will try<WH974> them as gold<WH2091> is tried<WH974>. They shall call<WH7121> on my name<WH8034>, and I will hear<WH6030> them<WH559>: I will say, It is my people<WH5971>; and they shall say<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> is my God<WH430>.
